title: 7 Hilariously Cool Costumes to Shop on Prime Day
description: From Tashi Duncan to Moo Deng, inspiration is everywhere.
excerpt: From Tashi Duncan to Moo Deng, inspiration is everywhere.
text: Halloween will be here sooner than you know it (somehow it’s already October???) and the pressure is already on to have a great costume. Luckily, with Prime Day upon us, you can get your outfit hunt out of the way now—on sale, too—so you’re not rummaging through a Spirit Halloween at the last minute. Below, we’ve rounded up a few suggestions to kick off your costume search this season. Moo Deng LILLIAN SUWANRUMPHA//Getty ImagesOh you want to dress like the hottest It girl right now? That would be Moo Deng, the baby Pygmy hippo going viral for being adorable and ever-moisturized, biting her handler, and embodying overall Babygirl behavior. There’s no better icon to emulate in this moment, I fear.Arnovic Hippo Bucket HatWafunne Animal Onesie CostumeNow 20% OffGeneric Moo Deng I Love You ShirtNow 13% OffElphabaUniversal PicturesWith Wicked season and spooky season overlapping, there’s no better time to get witchy. A classic black dress, pointed hat, and tights should do the trick—but don’t forget the most important step: the green body paint. Leg Avenue Ruched Witch HatSofsy Green TightsHibshaby Puff Sleeve Mini DressHarley QuinnNIKO TAVERNISEHopefully, your Halloween fares far better than Joker: Folie a Deux did at the box office. But perhaps the best part of the film and its press run, Lady Gaga’s take on Harley Quinn’s style (on screen and on the red carpet), is worth recreating this season. Think harlequin prints, heavy eye makeup, and pops of red. Hybrid & Company BlazerFashionme Argyle Sweater VestFahsyee Faux Leather SkirtTashi Duncan NIKO TAVERNISELives were changed when Challengers hit theaters this year, many thanks to Zendaya’s Tashi Duncan, a tennis pro, coach, and master manipulator. Her I TOLD YA T-shirt, designed by Loewe’s Jonathan Anderson, has become a symbol of the film, and it’s easy to incorporate a similar style into your costume this Halloween. SFAHPWP I Told Ya T-Shirt Now 69% OffSantiny Pleated Tennis SkirtNow 18% OffWilson Energy XL Tennis RacketNow 20% OffHarper SternHBOIf you’re missing your Industry Sundays after that season 3 finale, it’s time to tap into your inner Harper Stern. The young banker played by Myha’la isn’t flashy; she wears a lot of neutrals and suits so she can keep her focus on her cutthroat business. But her simplicity makes your costume search even easier: pull one of your office outfits out of the closet and throw on a headset, and you’re good to go. Siliteelon Classic-Fit Dress ShirtNow 15% OffKate Kasin Pencil SkirtLogitech H390 Wired HeadsetNow 24% OffCharli XCX Getty ImagesIt’s easy to channel the queen of brat summer with a lime green and black color palette, but if you want to get even more specific, try going for slinky outfits with an indie sleaze flair, paired with boots and dramatic gloves. For an extra 365 Party Girl touch, smudge your eye makeup. If you have a pinstripe suit, heels, and your hair tied up in a chignon, you’re ready to come to this place for magic. Bonus points if you have the full monologue memorized. She was previously an editor at HarpersBAZAAR.com. There is a 75 percent chance she's listening to Lorde right now.
html:
Halloween will be here sooner than you know it (somehow it’s already October???) and the pressure is already on to have a great costume. Luckily, with Prime Day upon us, you can get your outfit hunt out of the way now—on sale, too—so you’re not rummaging through a Spirit Halloween at the last minute. Below, we’ve rounded up a few suggestions to kick off your costume search this season.

Moo Deng

Oh you want to dress like the hottest It girl right now? That would be Moo Deng, the baby Pygmy hippo going viral for being adorable and ever-moisturized, biting her handler, and embodying overall Babygirl behavior. There’s no better icon to emulate in this moment, I fear.

Arnovic Hippo Bucket Hat

Wafunne Animal Onesie Costume

Now 20% Off

Generic Moo Deng I Love You Shirt

Now 13% Off

Elphaba

With Wicked season and spooky season overlapping, there’s no better time to get witchy. A classic black dress, pointed hat, and tights should do the trick—but don’t forget the most important step: the green body paint.

Leg Avenue Ruched Witch Hat

Sofsy Green Tights

Hibshaby Puff Sleeve Mini Dress

Harley Quinn

Hopefully, your Halloween fares far better than Joker: Folie a Deux did at the box office. But perhaps the best part of the film and its press run, Lady Gaga’s take on Harley Quinn’s style (on screen and on the red carpet), is worth recreating this season. Think harlequin prints, heavy eye makeup, and pops of red.

Hybrid & Company Blazer

Fashionme Argyle Sweater Vest

Fahsyee Faux Leather Skirt

Tashi Duncan

Lives were changed when Challengers hit theaters this year, many thanks to Zendaya’s Tashi Duncan, a tennis pro, coach, and master manipulator. Her I TOLD YA T-shirt, designed by Loewe’s Jonathan Anderson, has become a symbol of the film, and it’s easy to incorporate a similar style into your costume this Halloween.

SFAHPWP I Told Ya T-Shirt

Now 69% Off

Santiny Pleated Tennis Skirt

Now 18% Off

Wilson Energy XL Tennis Racket

Now 20% Off

Harper Stern

If you’re missing your Industry Sundays after that season 3 finale, it’s time to tap into your inner Harper Stern. The young banker played by Myha’la isn’t flashy; she wears a lot of neutrals and suits so she can keep her focus on her cutthroat business. But her simplicity makes your costume search even easier: pull one of your office outfits out of the closet and throw on a headset, and you’re good to go.

Siliteelon Classic-Fit Dress Shirt

Now 15% Off

Kate Kasin Pencil Skirt

Logitech H390 Wired Headset

Now 24% Off

Charli XCX

It’s easy to channel the queen of brat summer with a lime green and black color palette, but if you want to get even more specific, try going for slinky outfits with an indie sleaze flair, paired with boots and dramatic gloves. For an extra 365 Party Girl touch, smudge your eye makeup.

Spooktacular Creations Long Gloves

Now 56% Off

Nrthye Metallic Mini Dress

Modatope Knee-High Boots

Nicole Kidman’s AMC Commercial

The Patron Saint of Cinema, Nicole Kidman, specifically in this 2021 AMC Theatres ad, is prime costume material. If you have a pinstripe suit, heels, and your hair tied up in a chignon, you’re ready to come to this place for magic. Bonus points if you have the full monologue memorized.

Mogu 3-Piece Double-Breasted Suit

Badgley Mischka Cady Heeled Sandal

Now 70% Off

Voisen Popcorn Container Boxes

Erica Gonzales is the Senior Culture Editor at ELLE.com, where she oversees coverage on TV, movies, music, books, and more. She was previously an editor at HarpersBAZAAR.com. There is a 75 percent chance she's listening to Lorde right now.
